Title: Relates to the calculation of operating revenue for purposes of minimum direct resident care spending by residential health care facilities
Summary: Excludes one-time federal assistance in the calculation of operating revenue for purposes of minimum direct resident care spending by residential health care facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง2828, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to minimum direct resident care spending by residential health care facilities
